Text: hi! do you have the pdf copy? i cant open the epub...help pls thanks

hey smza25 i was having the same problem, just download the epub its real and then go to this site http://www.convertfiles.com/convert/ebook/EPUB-to-MOBI.html its just a converter you dont have to creat an account dont worry, i chose to covert epub to mobi since im reading on my kindle, but you can covert to pdf so , hope it helps and good readin
